text: هل فى ذلك قسم لذى حجر

translations.translation: Is there not an evidence in this for those who have sense?
Is there in this an oath for one endowed with understanding?
Is this not a sufficient oath for intelligent people?
Why is there an oath in this, for the intelligent?
Is there (not) in them sufficient proofs for men of understanding!
Truly in that there is an oath for those who possess understanding.
Is there in that an oath for a mindful man?
There surely is an oath for thinking man.
is there not in this strong evidence for a man of sense?
Indeed in that there is an oath for a man of sense.
Is there an oath in that for one possessing intellect?
Is there (not) in these an adjuration (or evidence) for those who understand?
There is indeed in them (the above oaths) sufficient proofs for men of understanding (and that, they should avoid all kinds of sins and disbeliefs, etc.)!
Is there in that an oath for the mindful?
Is there in this an oath for a rational person?
Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?

[89:5] Is there in that, oath, an oath for one of sense?, [one of] intellect (the response to the oath has been omitted, that is to say, [it is to be understood as something like], la-tu‘adhdhabunna yā kuffāra Makka, ‘you will assuredly be chastised O disbelievers of Mecca!’).
(There) in that which I have mentioned (surely is an oath for thinking man.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { هَلْ فِي ذَلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِى حِجْرٍ } معناه لذي عَقلٍ
 ويقالُ: لذي سِنٍّ ويقال: لذي حلمٍ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ هَلْ } يحتاج { فِي ذَلِكَ } أي: في كل واحد من المقسمات العظيمة الشأن { قَسَمٌ } ويمين يؤكدهما { لِّذِى حِجْرٍ } [الفجر: 5] عقل فطري خالص عن شوب الوهم والخيال، خال عن مزاحمة مطلق الإلف والعادات الحاصلة من الرسوم والتقليدات، الناشئة من ظلمَّات الطبيعة




وبالجملة: أقسم سبحانه بحق هذه المقسمات الرفيعة القدر والمكان أنه سبحانه يعذب أصحاب الزيغ والضلال، المقيدين بسلاسل الحرس وأغلال الآمال في الدنيا بشهوات الإمكان، وفي الآخرة بدركات النيران؛ يعني: كفار مكة خذلهم الله
